alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 4:32PM EDT until May 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Spencer County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Shelby County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Nelson County in central Kentucky... Anderson County in central Kentucky... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 432 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Taylorsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. In addition...continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
